Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church records
Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church records
This collection consists of subscription lists, receipts, and accounts dated 1865-1867 for the building fund of the Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn, N.Y.
This collection consists of subscription lists, receipts, and accounts dated 1865-1867 for the building fund of the Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn, N.Y.

Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)
This collection consists of subscription lists, receipts, and accounts for the building fund of the Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn, N.Y. Items date from 1865 to 1867.
Gift of Nathaniel R. Howell, 1956.
